item.title: Bonus: Launch
item.itunes:title: Bonus: Launch
item.description: Three out of five people dream of writing a book. Few follow through. What does it take to take that from dream to reality? In this special preview we hear as John August (Go, Big Fish, Charlie and The Chocolate Factory) takes his dream and turns it into a reality. Will it be successful? You’ll find out when we do. Subscribe to Launch today: www.wondery.fm/launch

You’ll find out when we do. Subscribe to Launch today: www.wondery.fm/launch
